storyInfo: Dwelling in the mountains, far away from the world, will Nine-Colored Deer rise above good and evil, pain and sorrow?

attributes.text: As a dream, as a fantasy. As a bubble, as a shadow. All that is false, all is as real.

attributes.content: Please, I'm begging you!
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: The merchant is offering a fortune to anyone who saves his daughter! Please, doctor, I'll do anything!
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: A Catastrophe is coming to the city my family lives in, and they're trapped... I can't bear the thought of leaving them there!
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: I know it's asking a lot after you saved my life, and I know you don't want to come down from the mountains, but I'm at my wit's end...
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: I'll only use the money to get my family out of there! I won't use it for anything else!
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: Please, this means everything to me! I swear to the heavens that I won't tell anyone! Let my flesh rot off my body if I break my vow!
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: It worked! It worked! Thank you! Thank you so much! I swear to the heavens that I'll repay your kindness! Let my flesh rot off my body if I break my vow!
Oh, mother... Here, drink up, it'll make you better.
We're out of medicine? Don't worry, we have Dr. Nine-Colored Deer here!
We haven't been able to contact the outside for days. Is there any other way?
More and more people are dying! I thought Nine-Colored Deer was supposed to save them!
Something's not right with her... Where did she come from? Why doesn't she charge any money? Don't tell me she's...?
She only stayed behind to advertise her medicine and gain our trust!
Look at her Originium Arts! She was the one who brought down the Catastrophe!
Elafia! Bringer of evil! Get out! Get out!
I thought I could earn their trust by saving their lives.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: I thought we could coexist in peace as long as I healed them, and showed them love.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: But is that true?
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: Go.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: Doctor!
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: You should not have come to me. I want nothing more to do with the world outside these mountains.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: Go, and do not return.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: I-I understand. I was foolish.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: I-I'll try to think of something else... I'm sorry for bothering you.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: Hello?
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: Ah, I knew you'd show up. Thank you for coming so late.
attributes.name: Clinician

attributes.content: How is the merchant's daughter?
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: She's here in the clinic. It's not clear what afflicts her, but she's getting weaker by the day. She's able to eat, but she spends most of the time sleeping. She complains of neck pains, and has had a fever for days.
attributes.name: Clinician

attributes.content: Her father is extremely anxious. Everyone knows he's looking for the great healer rumored to be living in these parts. I thought it was only a matter of time before you came down.
attributes.name: Clinician

attributes.content: I have never stood idly by and watched a patient die.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: But I had a visitor today. I'll need to find somewhere else to stay for a few days.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: Someone you saved?
attributes.name: Clinician

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: There's always people like that... Why don't they respect your wish to not be disturbed?
attributes.name: Clinician

attributes.content: It doesn't matter. I'll be more careful.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: Well, I'm just glad you're still willing to stay in the area at all.
attributes.name: Clinician

attributes.content: Thank you, Zishu. Now take me to the child.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: It hurts... It hurts so much...
attributes.name: Sickly Child

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: This is a rare illness... Not something that I can just whip up a remedy for.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: I'll be staying here for a couple of days. I want no visitors, other than patients.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: Understood. I'll make sure to keep out unwelcome guests.
attributes.name: Clinician

attributes.content: Mm.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: One more thing. I want you to pass this on to the merchant tomorrow...
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: What will people think this time? A cold and merciless Elafia...?
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: Two mace, half a mace, three mace... Roll these herbs into balls, and take them for eight days.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: It's so bitter...
attributes.name: Sickly Child

attributes.content: Would you like another flavor? Flowers perhaps, or tea?
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: I like flowers...
attributes.name: Sickly Child

attributes.content: Well then... there.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: Take a sniff.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: It smells... sweet?
attributes.name: Sickly Child

attributes.content: There, now swallow it. Not bitter at all, is it? It won't hurt so much anymore.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: Why is it sweet?
attributes.name: Sickly Child

attributes.content: You were crying because you didn't want to take your medicine, weren't you? It's sweet now, so there's no need to cry.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: And I'll give you some honey once you've had your medicine.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: Doctor, you need sleep. You haven't slept in three days!
attributes.name: Clinician

attributes.content: No, I need to finish this book first. It's important. I'll have my dinner after I'm done.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: What...? You just had dinner! I had to make you eat it!
attributes.name: Clinician

attributes.content: Oh, I see... Well, I'll go to bed after I finish this bookâ€”
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: Go to bed NOW!
attributes.name: Clinician

attributes.content: Day 2
What's up, Wang?
attributes.name: Passing Villager

attributes.content: I'm busy! Don't bother me!
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: What's the matter? Still short on money?
attributes.name: Passing Villager

attributes.content: People like us, we've gotta make it penny by penny, don't we? Wish I was like that rumored doctor who cured the merchant's daughter. Must've gotten a handsome reward.
attributes.name: Passing Villager

attributes.content: ...Doctor?
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: Yeah!
attributes.name: Passing Villager

attributes.content: Anyway, I'll leave you to it. It's already been a few days, and you need to get your family back as soon as you can, before anything else happens.
attributes.name: Passing Villager

attributes.content: Impossible... But she said...
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: The doctor's not that kind of person...
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: I'll confirm it with my own eyes tonight!
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: This one didn't work... This one's no good either; they can't be taken together.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: The last prescription was a little strong for little Ci's constitution... I need to rethink the dosage...
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: The side effect of this ingredient is too strong for her. It needs to go...
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: She's allergic to this one. I need to find a substitute...
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: No, it's not enough... I need more knowledge, to find another way. Time is running out...
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: We have the herbs you asked for... Whoa! What happened to your hair?
attributes.name: Clinician

attributes.content: Oh... Here, look at this, this recipe...
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: You keep doing that, I'll fetch a comb.
attributes.name: Clinician

attributes.content: These two ingredients don't go well together, but...
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: But...oh!
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: Whoa!
attributes.name: Clinician

attributes.content: I'm going into the mountains!
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: I guess your hair can wait...
attributes.name: Clinician

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: It's way after dark. Do you really have to go right now?
attributes.name: Clinician

attributes.content: I could be back by dawn if I hurry. This new medicine should finally do the trick.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: This is a poisonous weed that looks like an edible plant. Better mark it so no one eats it by accident.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: I've tried marking immature herbs, but that hasn't worked. Next time, I should move them into the garden.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: I hope bugs don't get to them... Never mind, I don't have time for this.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: The sun's already rising. Still no luck...
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: Was it here? I can't find the marks I left the last time...
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: Whoa, this is a poisonous plant... Never mind, it can wait. But this is about as high an altitude as the herbs will grow.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: 'It is the color of snow, with a bitter but pure taste. It is found mostly in the clefts of rocks or on cliffs.' On cliffs...
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: I'm exhausted... but I have to get the herb. Ci can't wait...
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: The books say you should tie a knot like this... Never thought I'd be using that knowledge like this.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: There! Let's hope this works.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: She's treating the girl?
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: Didn't she refuse? Didn't she say she didn't want to come down from the mountains?
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: ...Why?
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: How is she?
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: Her fever has subsided, she had porridge this morning without throwing up, and the swelling in her neck has gone down somewhat.
attributes.name: Clinician

attributes.content: Thank goodness.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: Why is your hair a different color from ours?
attributes.name: Sickly Child

attributes.content: Hmm... Do you like the pattern it makes?
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: Yes! Daddy said your hair is so beautiful because you're a really good person.
attributes.name: Sickly Child

attributes.content: My daddy's a good person too. Why won't you trust him?
attributes.name: Sickly Child

attributes.content: What do you mean?
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: Zishu won't let me or daddy tell anyone that you saved my life.
attributes.name: Sickly Child

attributes.content: It's alright.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: I'm just happy you're alive and well, Ci. You don't need to say or do anything for me.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Sickly Child

attributes.content: But I haven't seen daddy for days. Where'd he go?
attributes.name: Sickly Child

attributes.content: I asked your daddy for a favor. Just let him see you happy and healthy when he comes back in a few days, okay?
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: Okay!
attributes.name: Sickly Child

attributes.content: It's getting late. Come on, lie down and I'll tell you a story.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: A long, long time ago in a forest far, far away...
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: Two days later
*Yawn* Oh, it feels so good to stretch like this...
attributes.name: Clinician

attributes.content: *Yawn*...
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: You need to rest your eyes after going through an entire roomful of books these past few days. It's a nice day outside. I should let Ci's bedding get some sun too.
attributes.name: Clinician

attributes.content: It's nice to see her getting better, isn't it?
attributes.name: Clinician

attributes.content: Yes, I'll go see if she needs a change of medicine. Let's get her an armchair so she can sit outside.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: And I'll make some tea. Any preferences?
attributes.name: Clinician

attributes.content: Anything made by you.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: Remember to add some sugar for Ci though.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: Sugar in tea? Blasphemy!
attributes.name: Clinician

attributes.content: I want something sweet...
attributes.name: Sickly Child

attributes.content: Alright, alright.
attributes.name: Clinician

attributes.content: What a beautiful day... Not a cloud in the sky.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: Ci, remember that poem you said you liked? How did it go?
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: 'A little sun, and floating cotton, speckles made of porcelain paint.'
attributes.name: Sickly Child

attributes.content: My name means porcelain, too!
attributes.name: Sickly Child

attributes.content: Now, make sure you keep your blanket on, so you don't catch a cold.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: Is somebody there?
attributes.name: Clinician

attributes.content: Open up! Open up!
Who is it?
attributes.name: Clinician

attributes.content: Anyone in there?
I know you're there, doctor! I saw you with my own eyes!
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: You've been treating that merchant's daughter, haven't you? I thought you didn't care about money.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: I believed you, and look what it got me!
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: Who's this doctor you're talking about?
attributes.name: Passing Villager

attributes.content: What's going on here?
attributes.name: Onlooker

attributes.content: What nonsense are you on about!?
attributes.name: Clinician

attributes.content: What happened...?
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: I know you're in there, doctor!
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: They say they've already evacuated the city, but I haven't heard from my family in days! I have no idea where they are! The Catastrophe, it...
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: It's my own fault that I couldn't get the money to save my family! I'm not blaming anyone for that!
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: But do you really take us for fools!?
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: Did you lie to me because you wanted the money yourself!?
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: Me? Money?
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: My goodness! It's one thing to not offer help, but to lie?
attributes.name: Onlooker

attributes.content: Who is this doctor? I'm certainly never visiting them!
attributes.name: Onlooker

attributes.content: That's right! That's right!
attributes.name: Passing Villager

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: I knew it would come to this.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: (I thought I could earn their trust by saving their lives.)
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: (I thought we could coexist in peace as long as I healed them, and showed them love.)
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: (But is that true?)
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: You're lying! She didn't ask for a single coin! *cough*...
attributes.name: Sickly Child

attributes.content: Hey, you shouldn't be running around!
attributes.name: Clinician

attributes.content: I'm fine... I can't let them bully her!
attributes.name: Sickly Child

attributes.content: You're all bad people! How could you think... She's not like that...
attributes.name: Sickly Child

attributes.content: *cough*...
attributes.name: Sickly Child

attributes.content: Ci...
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: Thank you, Ci.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: I'll speak to him.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: Showing your face at last, doctor?
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: The door's opening... So who is it?
attributes.name: Passing Villager

attributes.content: Here they come... Wait, Dr. Nine-Colored Deer?
attributes.name: Enthusiastic Villager

attributes.content: He was talking about Dr. Nine-Colored Deer? Er...
attributes.name: Onlooker

attributes.content: I'm an ass! We're all asses! It's Dr. Nine-Colored Deer!
attributes.name: Enthusiastic Villager

attributes.content: She's the who saved my life when I was so badly hurt from falling rocks that my family started preparing the funeral!
attributes.name: Enthusiastic Villager

attributes.content: Oh, THAT doctor? Wait, who should I believe now?
attributes.name: Onlooker

attributes.content: S-She told me not to let anyone know! But didn't I tell you? She didn't charge me a single coin, and even gave me a whole bunch of herbs!
attributes.name: Enthusiastic Villager

attributes.content: Ah... it's you.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: Yes, me! You remember, right?
attributes.name: Enthusiastic Villager

attributes.content: You guys hear that? Everything I said was true, every last word! She's not the kind of person who'd lie for money!
attributes.name: Enthusiastic Villager

attributes.content: You saved my life, doctor! I'm on your side, no matter what anyone else says!
attributes.name: Enthusiastic Villager

attributes.content: ...Thank you.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: Butâ€”
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: Daddy's back, Ci! But why are you standing out here like that? And what's with all these people?
attributes.name: Merchant

attributes.content: You're back, daddy! A bad guy is bullying the doctor!
attributes.name: Sickly Child

attributes.content: He said the doctor tricked him and won't save his family...
attributes.name: Sickly Child

attributes.content: Family? You mean the two people from the city?
attributes.name: Merchant

attributes.content: She didn't ask me for any money. She only asked me to fetch those two. They're staying at a nearby inn right now. What's going on?
attributes.name: Merchant

attributes.content: Two people from the city... You can't mean...?
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: I never intended for you to find out.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: I wasn't lying when I said I didn't want to be involved with other people.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: Really? My family... They're safe?
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: If you mean the woman and child I brought back, yes, they're perfectly safe.
attributes.name: Merchant

attributes.content: Y-You did this for me, doctor?
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: I wasn't helping you.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: I was just... just...
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: You were helping me the whole time...
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: But I doubted you... I... I...
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: What have I done... I'm such a fool.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: I... I'm so sorry...
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: It's alright. I never told you anything.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: Thank you for saving my daughter, doctor. It seems we've caused you more trouble than expected though.
attributes.name: Merchant

attributes.content: I owe you so much, and have more than a few connections... I could put you in touch with one of the big city hospitals, if you like.
attributes.name: Merchant

attributes.content: D-Don't go, doctor, I still have to make it up to you!
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: No need to worry.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: I'm happy right where I am.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: Some days later
My daughter has made a full recovery, thanks to you. Please accept these medical books as a token of my appreciation.
attributes.name: Merchant

attributes.content: Nine-Colored Deer! Zishu!
attributes.name: Sickly Child

attributes.content: Mind your manners, Ci.
attributes.name: Merchant

attributes.content: It's alright. It's good to see her up and about like this, after being sick for so long.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: I thought I could earn their trust by saving their lives.
Thank you so much... I thought I'd be fine after washing the wound, but that plant turned out to be poisonous and my leg started swelling...
attributes.name: Wounded Villager

attributes.content: You would have lost it if you'd waited any longer!
attributes.name: Clinician

attributes.content: Thank you so much, doctor. We're so blessed to have you in our village!
attributes.name: Wounded Villager

attributes.content: Just be careful in the future. Take these pills; they'll cure the toxins from most poisonous plants.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: I healed them.
Let's see... I believe I left a mark here, for the herbs on the cliffs?
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: Good, the bugs haven't gotten to them.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: It's almost autumn. I should save some seeds and try planting them myself.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: Showed them love.
I got Nine-Colored Deer! I win!
attributes.name: Frisky Kid

attributes.content: Aw, I want some too!
attributes.name: Frisky Kid

attributes.content: No, I won, so I get the candy!
attributes.name: Frisky Kid

attributes.content: No need to fight; there's enough for everyone. We'll play again tomorrow, okay?
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: And we coexisted in peace.

attributes.text: As a dream, as a fantasy. As a bubble, as a shadow. All that is false, all is as real.

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: How was it?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Has the painting helped you come to terms?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: It is...
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: All is ethereal, like a fleeting dream.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: So, how are things now?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: I have not seen Zishu in years. I should find her.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: But I also have herbs to deliver elsewhere... They should be nearby.
attributes.name: Nine-Colored Deer

attributes.content: Already giving yourself more work? Fascinating.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: I don't wish to leave this place just yet... When these mountains are covered in flowers, I'll seek you out again. Let's have a drink together.
attributes.name: Dusk
